summary: Golf social dating app connecting single golfers through online profiles with handicap and social preferences (business, pleasure, casual, romantic). Features gender-based and couples searching, location-based map showing singles by proximity to golf courses, course booking integration, course directory, sponsors page, and event hosting.
architectural_notes: Social dating platform focused on golf community
Location-based services required for proximity matching
Integration with external golf course booking systems
User authentication and profile management system
known_issues: Post-login pages lack content and functional navigation
Get Started button on landing page is non-functional

existing_features.title: Create location-based map view that displays online single golfers by their proximity to the user's location or specific golf course locations
Build main landing page with sign up button, log in button, and golf course background image as backdrop
Implement course booking search feature that allows users to search for golf course bookings and links to local booking sites or course websites
Create course directory page that lists golf courses with details and contact information
Build sponsors page to display sponsor information and branding
Create event host page where users can view and create golf events
Implement chat system that allows matched users to communicate with each other through real-time or async messaging
Design and apply a cohesive visual theme with golf-inspired colors (greens, earth tones), clean typography, and modern layout patterns that evoke sophistication and outdoor sporting elegance
Replace the golf ball icon in the header navigation with the Lime Greens™ brand logo
Update the landing page hero section to feature the Lime Greens™ brand logo prominently
Render the generated Lime Greens™ logo image as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated
Populate the MapView page with functional content showing matched golfer profiles in an interactive grid or map interface with filtering options for handicap range, distance, and social preference
Enhance the CourseDirectory page with functional search and filter controls for course name, location, and amenities
Add functional navigation buttons and content sections to the EventsPage including upcoming events list, past events archive, and RSVP functionality
Implement functional message composition and conversation management in the ChatPage with message history, typing indicators, and read status
Add functional sponsor cards to the SponsorsPage with clickable logos, descriptions, and external links to sponsor websites
Make all header navigation links and buttons functional across all authenticated pages with active state indicators
Enhance the CourseBooking page with functional search filters for date, time, number of players, and course location with real-time availability display
Add click handler to the Get Started button on the landing page that initiates Internet Identity authentication flow

new_feature_requests.summary: User profiles with handicap and social preference fields
Search filters for gender matching and couples/twosome searches
Location-based map showing singles near golf courses
Main landing page with golf course backdrop, sign up and log in buttons
Course booking search integration with local booking sites
Chat system for users to communicate
Create user profile system with fields for handicap (numeric), gender (male/female/couple), social preference (business/pleasure/casual/romantic), location (coordinates or address), and bio text
Implement search functionality that filters users by gender preference matching (male searching female, female searching male, couples searching other twosomes)
Add Lime Greens™ brand logo to the app
Add functional content and working buttons/navigation to all pages after user login
